options.a: They prevent chaos on the road and promote accountability for drivers.
options.b: They are not important, and just a way for the city to make money.
options.c: They promote safety and provide a common understanding of the roads.

sectio2.question: You could be deemed a “negligent operator” by the DMV if you get

options.a: 4 Points on your record in 24 months
options.b: 8 points on your record in 36 months
options.c: 2 points on your record in 24 months
options.d: 7 points on your record in a lifetime

sectio2.question: YA Blood Alcohol Content (BAC) of _________ or higher is considered legally under the influence of alcohol for drivers over the age of 21.
